title: Spriggan rider
data: {{version030}} {{list of|spriggans}} {{monster info}} ==Useful Info== '''Spriggan riders''' are fast mounted opponents which ride [[hornet]]s, shooting [[dart]]s and attacking you with [[Polearms]]. They are impossible to escape on foot and hit hard, making them surprisingly deadly opponents. They can be found in the [[Swamp]] and in rare "spriggan forest" [[vault]]s found throughout the dungeon and its branches. When a spriggan rider is damaged below 50% HP, there's a 100% - (2 * current_hp%) chance you kill either the [[spriggan (monster)|spriggan]] or its [[hornet]] mount, leaving the other behind (equal chance for each).{{source ref|0.30.0|monster.cc|5811}} The survivor will have the same HP value (not percent) as the spriggan rider when it died, and keeps any statuses it had. ==Tips & Tricks== *[[Poison resistance]] renders their darts harmless. *Darts require a clear line of fire in order to hit you. However, their polearms can [[reach]] over other monsters. *If you manage to kill a spriggan rider's hornet while it's flying over [[deep water]], it will drop the spriggan into the water and kill it instantly. *Thankfully, spriggan riders don't have the paralytic poison of [[hornet]]s. If the spriggan dies, however, you'll risk [[paralysis]] (if you don't have immunity to poison). ==History== *Prior to [[0.19]], they rode [[wasp]]s instead of hornets. *Prior to [[0.15]], they rode [[giant fireflies]] instead of wasps. *Spriggan riders were added in [[0.7]]. ==References== [[Category:Spriggan]]
